summary: An ex-pop singer kills her much-hated husband to be with her young lover. Her daughter plots Electra-like revenge.
cast: Charles Busch|Angela Paton|Jason Priestley|Natasha Lyonne|Frances Conroy|Philip Baker Hall|Stark Sands|Joshua Farrell|Victor Raider-Wexler|Nora Dunn|Christopher McDaniel|Tom Hughes|Stanley DeSantis|Paul Vinson|Steve Guilmette
title: Die, Mommie, Die!
